title: MY country close to OCE, WHY OCE Server always fluctuating 463-640 ??!! Please Riot IT answer me!!
body:
First, sorry , my English not very good. 

I'm League player from Indonesia. I've been playing League since season 2 in NA server. In NA , Before server migration , I always play with 240ms ( for me delay 0.19 ms playable) . After server migration i got 280-300 ms ( i addapting , playable ) . 

Here some Prove ?! 

280 ms ?! !no problem 

http://postimg.org/image/goy4neq87/

290ms ?! no problem.
http://postimg.org/image/g34jvvl6f/
(note : i changed the ojokdolananwae summoner name ATM)

{{champion:24}} : "Imagine if i have real ~~weapon ~~ ping "
----
I admit little hard to climb with 280-300 ping. i achieved Gold tier last season in NA server. I played in Garena server too, but Garena league client have alot of bug, Example :  i have 32 ping but FPS keep drop into 7 FPS. i check the logs -  Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs - .  many missing stuff like models and so on ,its cosumming CPU. 

Due to this issues,  i try to create new account and playing in OCE .

About Feb 2016 (acc creation) , the ping average between 190-285ms , i was happy  . 

1 month ago i kinda surprise my ping reach 150-190 about 3 days. 
(forgot where i put the ss ) 

(ss after patch 6.9 couple days ago)
http://postimg.org/image/epokfsxg1/

Now ping fluctuating... 430 - 600 (already happen about 1 month or so), reconnecting game, reset router etc not helping, i checked my ping to google each second for stability measurement- the result stationary and no RTO . what happen with OCE  server? please Staff explain it to me. Are OCE server now farter than INA -> North America ? 


Note : since this problem occur, i've to back playing in NA server -the ping static flat at 280-300 since server migration UNTIL NOW . OCE server fluctuating higher . 

Just now match - today ss : 
http://postimg.org/image/kg04wmsep/ 

http://postimg.org/image/7iw5mhqa9/

http://postimg.org/image/5smrvv4gh/

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 


--please any people help me fix my grammar -clarity please- {{summoner:13}}  .. i wish riot OCE IT staff read this  , understand, answer and fix the problem . thanks --

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

The oceanic platform only officially supports the following countries

* Australia
* New Zealand
* Guam
* New Caledonia
* French Polynesia
* Fiji
* Northern Mariana Islands

You may experience a better connection on the garena server, https://lol.garena.co.id/

You mentioned you've tried garena before but experienced framerate issues, you should check out the [Low FPS troubleshooting](http://support.lol.garena.com/en_SG/articles/400) article on the garena support site.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=H1NdOVJE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-10T09:56:39.934+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> The oceanic platform only officially supports the following countries
> 
> * Australia
> * New Zealand
> * Guam
> * New Caledonia
> * French Polynesia
> * Fiji
> * Northern Mariana Islands
> 
> You may experience a better connection on the garena server, https://lol.garena.co.id/
> 
> You mentioned you've tried garena before but experienced framerate issues, the [Low FPS troubleshooting](http://support.lol.garena.com/en_SG/articles/400) article on the garena support site.

Ok,  i see, i guess playing in NA server the best option for me ATM. Garena league client (no hextect crafting, old history match, often broken every single patch,etc).  

Thanks for the answer SephirothSG

[Hextech crafting should be coming to garena soon (Possibly in the next few patches.)](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4dqhf7/in_garena_we_still_dont_have_hextech_crafting/d1uljcc)

[You're also able to enable the new match history yourself (however this is slightly buggy and may not display some matches)](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4dqhf7/in_garena_we_still_dont_have_hextech_crafting/d1te5at)

no matter what, those Garena  client suck, and hextech available in next year (2017) i believe, 

The history match , been 1 year, still old (using 2013), bad statistic

> [{quoted}](name=nusantara,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=H1NdOVJE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-10T10:16:09.547+0000)
>
> Ok,  i see, i guess playing in NA server the best option for me ATM. Garena league client (no hextect crafting, old history match, often broken every single patch,etc).  
> 
> Thanks for the answer SephirothSG


Hi SephirothSG , today i try to playing couple games in OCE server. For your information , OCE server back to normal from my point of view. Please convey this message to IT riot Server admin , "Please Keep this , i love it , don't change server config"
